backend/main.mo: Main migratable actor implementing user profiles, recovery features, medications, meetings, commitments, and Combine entry storage with access control.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module upgrading existing actor state by adding empty CombineState while preserving prior user data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collected short summaries of many frontend files describing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS theme and color token definitions for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup, theming, and authenticated vs guest routing with profile setup handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with automatic state clearing and status handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting user for their name and saving the profile using a mutation with validation and toast messages.
frontend/src/components/combine/Benchmar: Displays benchmark comparison results with badges and benchmark thresholds for a given drill.
frontend/src/components/combine/CombineE: Form for creating or editing combine entries with validation, input fields, and sectioned layout.
frontend/src/components/combine/CombineT: Renders a simple SVG trend chart for combine metrics, including points, labels, and improvement indicator.
Builds trend datasets from entries and renders charts for dash, vertical jump, and bench press.
Main application layout with header, navigation, footer, and user identity display.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous actor and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCombine.ts: Provides query and mutation hooks for loading, saving, updating, and deleting combine entries for users or guests.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, wrapping AuthClient setup, login, logout, and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks to fetch and save the current user's profile using an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base layers and defines light and dark CSS variables for theme colors and layout styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/combine/Dashboard.tsx: Displays the combine dashboard with latest entry, navigation cards, and performance trends.
frontend/src/pages/combine/EntryDetail.t: Shows detailed combine entry data with drill stats, sharing, publishing, and deletion actions.
frontend/src/pages/combine/History.tsx: Displays the user's combine entry history with navigation to individual entries and basic stat previews.
frontend/src/pages/combine/NewEntry.tsx: Provides a form for creating a new combine entry and saves it via a mutation before redirecting to the entry page.
frontend/src/pages/combine/PublicEntry.t: Shows a public combine entry with detailed drill results and benchmark comparisons.
frontend/src/pages/combine/Published.tsx: Lists all publicly shared combine entries with quick stat previews and navigation to each public entry.
frontend/src/pages/combine/ShareCard.tsx: Generates a shareable view of a combine entry with copyable links for public entries and formatted stat display.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Implements the landing page with feature descriptions, guest mode entry, and login options.
frontend/src/utils/combineBenchmarks.ts: Defines benchmark values for combine drills and provides comparison logic to categorize performance levels.
frontend/src/utils/combineGuestStorage.t: Implements localStorage-based CRUD operations for storing and managing guest combine entries.
frontend/src/utils/combineValidation.ts: Defines form data and validation logic for combine measurements, checking required athlete name and numeric ranges, plus helpers for optional number parsing.
frontend/src/utils/exporters.ts: Empty file placeholder for future exporting utilities.
frontend/src/utils/reminders.ts: Empty file placeholder for reminder-related utilities.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL or hash parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing stored or URL-based values.
frontend/src/utils/userScopedStorage.ts: Empty file placeholder for user-scoped storage helpers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, typography, animations, container settings, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, features, requirements, and image needs for the NFL Combine tracking app.
